  - Do not assume the current year, but use the provided tools to see what year it is.

The refunded order (ORDER-107495) was for a TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse, but its discount details were not available for comparison. However, the current discount of 90% is quite substantial.

To proceed, if you would like to refund the order and then apply the current discount to the MacBook purchase, I'll need you to verify the refund first. You have received a One Time Password (OTP) to do this.
